sentence.idiomatic: You're our very honored guest today.
You truly are a well respected elderly person.
Honored guests, welcome to our restaurant.
We have invited a special guest to today’s party.
You are responsible for receiving the guests.
Thank you to each of our guests for attending our banquet despite your busy schedules.
I am really honored to be attending this event.
It is my honor to make your acquaintance.
To be able to interview such a big star is a huge honor.
Chinese traditional opera has a long history.
The Chinese Spring Festival is the embodiment of the long-standing traditional importance of family in Chinese culture.
Xi'an is a famous city with long history.
Everyone wants to have a magnificent future.
Her magnificent smile left me with a deep impression.
On this soil our ancestors created a magnificent ancient civilization.
People were amazed by his outstanding performance in this competition.
His design amazed everyone.
Coming here, everyone is amazed by nature's beauty.
He is famous in this field.
I believe you will definitely make an achievement in this field.
In the IT field, as soon as you mention his name there isn't anyone who doesn't know him.
People admire his good work ethic.
He said the person he admires most is his mother.
I admire their ability to deal with problems.
Thank you for your vigorous support.
Don't worry. We all support you.
With everyone's support, I will certainly succeed.
What we are seeking is mutual benefit.
Through competition we must gain mutual benefit.
Cooperation between our two companies can bring benefit to both sides.
Greetings to each of our esteemed leaders and guests!
I am very honored to be here today. I am very fond of China. The scenery here is beautiful, and the people are very hospitable.
Chinese civilization has a long history and a magnificent culture. Even so, the development of the past few years has really stunned people.
Every time I come here, I discover many changes. Regardless of what aspect—the economy, the service, or urban construction—your country’s progress is laudable.
I feel truly honored to be able to participate in this process, and am even more grateful for all of your guidance and support.
I will do everything in my power to bring the greatest mutual benefits to all of us.
Just as you all do, I firmly believe that continued international cooperation will create a better tomorrow. Again, thank you to all of you for your valuable guidance.

word.literal: of benefit to both sides, mutual benefit
